item.title: Poisoned well
item.description: People are, rightly, worried about the impact that systems like ChatGPT will have on the veracity of information in general and our ability to find accurate information on search engines such as Google, Bing and Duck Duck Go. I would like to suggest that this is already a problem and that a relentless AI circle-jerk of content referencing will make most of the internet unusable.

item.title: When you wish upon a...
item.description: Star light, star bright, First star I see tonight; I wish I may, I wish I might Know if you are a Starlink satellite 2022 has been a year defined by corporations releasing products and services without any thought given to consequences or even such piffling factors as ethics and morality.
